name: Pistachio Almond Cardamom Popsicle - Pista Kulfi - vegan glutenfree
description: Indian Pista Kulfi Dessert. Creamy Pistachio Almond Cardamom Popsicle. Non Dairy Ice Cream. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup almond milk or other non dairy milk  (or make your own nut milk)
2 teaspoons cornstarch or any thickening starch (or 1 Tablespoon ground cashew)

recipeInstructions.text: Grind the Pistachios and then the almonds into as fine a powder as possible.(some of it may become buttery, which is fine), or use pistachio or almond butter,
recipeInstructions.name: Grind the Pistachios and then the almonds into as fine a powder as possible.(some of it may become buttery, which is fine), or use pistachio or almond butter,

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add the ground Pistachios and almonds, cornstarch, raw sugar, spices and Almond milk. Blend well until the mixture is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add the ground Pistachios and almonds, cornstarch, raw sugar, spices and Almond milk. Blend well until the mixture is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer mix to a pan and bring to just about a boil on low-medium heat, stirring almost constantly.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer mix to a pan and bring to just about a boil on low-medium heat, stirring almost constantly.

recipeInstructions.text: Or microwave for 30 seconds. Stir and microwave for 30 seconds again(it should bubble slightly).
recipeInstructions.name: Or microwave for 30 seconds. Stir and microwave for 30 seconds again(it should bubble slightly).

recipeInstructions.text: The mixture will thicken at just about the boiling stage. Add a few tsp more nut flour(pistachio/almond or cashew) if you like it the kulfi mix to be really thick. If adding cashew flour, then bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: The mixture will thicken at just about the boiling stage. Add a few tsp more nut flour(pistachio/almond or cashew) if you like it the kulfi mix to be really thick. If adding cashew flour, then bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat. Let cool a bit. Taste and adjust sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat. Let cool a bit. Taste and adjust sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cardamom, pepper/candied ginger is using, mix , then transfer to Popsicle, Kulfi, or ice cream molds or ramekins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cardamom, pepper/candied ginger is using, mix , then transfer to Popsicle, Kulfi, or ice cream molds or ramekins.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the open molds/ramekins with aluminium foil and let freeze overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the open molds/ramekins with aluminium foil and let freeze overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the popsicles or molds sit out or dip in warm-hot water to take the frozen ice cream out.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the popsicles or molds sit out or dip in warm-hot water to take the frozen ice cream out.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as is, or in a parfait with fresh mango, pistachio, and ginger snap crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve as is, or in a parfait with fresh mango, pistachio, and ginger snap crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Or drizzle some salted caramel or peppered sugar syrup.
